short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Little Alchemy 2 is live current version! Start with four basic items and use them to find items.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Little Alchemy Unblocked - start with four basic items and use them to find dinosaurs, unicorns and spaceships!

Relish Little Alchemy Unblocked at work and at school by installing this app.

Mix elements to create interesting, fun and surprising items. Play at your own pace. Every combination is a little puzzle to solve.

This is a full "Little Alchemy" game, not a link to a site or iframe. Our game does not require fast internet or fast internet connection.

Additionally Little Alchemy Unblocked may show a convenient button to start this game directly from the serp, when you are searching for it. You can disable this prompt permanently if you wish.
